column4: hi, I am trying to watch a .mov video (works fine in windows) and when I try to view in any media player, I get a large green horizontal line on the video. Any ideas?
You don't mention what video play you're using, but often when one player has problems, another won't. Try xine, mplayer or VLC
by any player, I mean I have tried VLC, totem and mplayer, none work
In that case, try a different video display type: XV, x11, GL, etc.
